paragraphs.title: Load all capitals
paragraphs.text:
val capitals = spark.read.parquet("data/spatial/capitals.parquet").select("name", "country")
val luceneRDD = LuceneRDD(capitals)

luceneRDD.cache
luceneRDD.count

paragraphs.title: Search for Ottawa
paragraphs.text:
val k = 10
val result = luceneRDD.termQuery("name", "ottawa", k)

result.take(k).foreach(println)

msg.data:
k: Int = 10

paragraphs.title: Prefix query for "par"
paragraphs.text:
val topK = 10
val response = luceneRDD.prefixQuery("name", "par", topK)
response.take(k).foreach(println)
